references.paper_title: Combined statistical-mechanistic modeling links ion channel genes to physiology of cortical neuron types.
references.reason: This paper provides the single-compartment Hodgkin-Huxley model used in the experiments, demonstrating the application of the proposed method to real-world data and validating its applicability in a complex biological system.

references.paper_title: Efficient multivariate entropy estimation via k-nearest neighbour distances.
references.reason: This paper introduces the Kozachenko-Leonenko entropy estimator used in Sourcerer, a crucial component for estimating the entropy of high-dimensional source distributions.

references.paper_title: Sliced and Radon Wasserstein barycenters of measures.
references.reason: This paper introduces the Sliced-Wasserstein distance metric used in the proposed method, enabling efficient computation of distances between high-dimensional probability distributions.

references.paper_title: Neural empirical Bayes: Source distribution estimation and its applications to simulation-based inference.
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Empirical Bayes, a state-of-the-art method for source distribution estimation used as a benchmark for the proposed approach and establishes the relevance of maximum entropy source distributions.

references.paper_title: Maximum entropy for hypothesis formulation, especially for multidimensional contingency tables.
references.reason: This paper introduces the maximum entropy principle, which is the theoretical foundation for the proposed approach and motivates the choice of maximum entropy as a desirable property for source distributions.
